description: central roundel decorated with image of two women, two children and man in a landscape with water at left; three cartouches at interior around edge with images of similar group drinking tea in an interior, view of a landscape with bridge, buildings, trees and distant mountains, and two men and two women in an interior; exterior has wide floral band and narrower geometric bands; much gilt decoration
markings: two seals on base, in black and gold: top: cross inscribed in circle | bottom: 隆山 {Ryūsan}
title: Bowl with design of landscape and genre scenes
